description:
APT 3.0 package manager for Debian-based systems is now available with a compeltely revamped command-line interface and other changes. Here's what's new!

The post APT 3.0 Debian Package Manager Released with Revamped Command-Line Interface appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: APT 3.0 Debian Package Manager Released with Revamped Command-Line Interface
